summary: An independent scientist is joined by former members of the official investigation into the 1996 crash of TWA Flight 800 to blow the whistle on the cover-up of the real cause of the crash.
cast: Merritt Birky|Roy Blunt|Al Dickinson|Vernon L. Grose|Robert Hager|James Kallstrom|Bernard Loeb|Charley Pereira|Tom Stalcup|James Traficant|Charles Wetli
title: TWA Flight 800
